Html:
I downloaded Prismv4.exe on my XP pro(32bit) machine. In the explorer, when I run this file, it does nothing. I also noted that previous drops had this problem which was later rectified. Can anyone throw some light on it. Apparently this issue is only on XP.

 

Thanks.

Hi,

As you mentioned, the issue reported when installing Prism 4 on XP has been solved. But there is another known issue, which is related to the program that you use for extracting self extractable files. For more information about this, you could take a look at the following article in the KB:

  • Setup issues with Prism v2.2/v4.0 when a non-default program is used to open zip files

Hope this helps.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero

Thanks.

Link was useful but it did not work for me; but it hinted at the problem. I ended up doing the following and that made it work:

REGSVR32 ZIPFLDR.DLL  (Courtesy: http://windowsxp.mvps.org/zipfldr.htm).

Hi,

I am glad that you found the solution in your scenario. Thanks for sharing this with the rest of the community, since other users with a similar situation might find this useful.

Thanks again.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
